title: I have an eror code 003 (Can't update the game)
body: Can i get some help about it ?

replies.body: also look here if you are having issues https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/X6V5Znfk-error-code-003-13th-june-2018

After some research, I may have found a solution (it's working for me anyway)

C: > Riot Games > League of Legends > RADS > projects > lol_game_client

In that folder, delete the folder named "releases." After that, try launching your game again. Mine just finished patching fine.
